at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.db

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.db.Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Database storing DataObject derived objects backed by multiple HashMaps mapping Long IDs to objects. Every object in the database is referenced twice: by a global map and by a map for its specific class (type). This class is fully thread-safe at the cost of permitting only purely synchronous (single-threaded) access. Furthermore queries return BlockingDeques containing the results to ensure thread-safety. Since only references are stored inside a deque the objects itself are mutable.
    Author:
    Bernd Pr√ºnster
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • put

        public void put(DataObject obj,
                boolean save)
        Stores the provided object in the database. If the object already exists it is overwritten
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to store inside the database
        save - a flag indicating whether the change should be presisted immediately or not (so it can be done maually at a later point)
